definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua

sentences.english: Travertine is a volcanically heated, calcium-rich flow from hot springs.
sentences.chinese: 石灰華是火山似的熱，富有的鈣流動來自於溫泉。

sentences.english: Colosseum in Rome landmarks such as the use of travertine .
sentences.chinese: 羅馬的圓形大劇場等標誌性建築就使用了石灰華。

sentences.english: Travertine is an important part in Karst.
sentences.chinese: 石灰華是岩溶地貌的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Remodeled kitchen, wood and travertine flooring and much more.
sentences.chinese: 新改造的廚房，木材和石灰華地板等等。

sentences.english: Amazing climbing on tufas and stalagtites.
sentences.chinese: 在石灰華和鐘乳石上進行攀爬。
